attributes.action: Go to War against the Islamic State (IS) militants and send the British Army
attributes.additional_details: I therefore ask a debate should be held and a vote to end this tyranny and flagrant abuse of human rights and unite all nations to wage war against Islamic State (IS) militants the terrorists. I ask Her Majesty's Government to invade in self defence and neutralize the Islamic State (IS) militants by sending the British Army, Navy, RAF to Syria and IRAQ.
attributes.background: The critical problem of these terrorists are overwhelming. They are an intolerable nuisance to the freedoms we take pride in and enjoy.
